name: STRAIGHT UP (C64)
description:
Four veggies - Tomato, Onion, Lettuce and Eggplant - want to get as high as possible!

Try to outrace your opponents by jumping up faster in versus mode, or try to achieve a team highscore in coop mode. If you have no friends, you can also enjoy the game in single-player mode!

This great action game supports the "Classical Games 4-Player Interface", which you can buy online for little money, or you can even build one by yourself. More information about this device can be found here. 

Note: This is a game for the Commodore C64 home computer. If you have no C64 or if you have no possibility to transfer .PRG or .D64 files to a real C64, you can use an Emulator like VICE to play it on your PC/Mac or similar (VICE actually supports 4 joysticks, btw).
